com.cerner.beadledom.lifecycle.legacy

Interface LifecycleShutdownManager

  • Deprecated. 
    The Governator lifecycle implementation should be used instead if possible

    @Deprecated
public interface LifecycleShutdownManager
    A manager of lifecycle shutdown hooks.

    Lifecycle methods annotated with @PreDestroy are registered with this manager, and when shutdown() is executed all lifecycle shutdown methods are executed.

    Warning: This class is part of the internal implementation for Guice lifecycle containers and should not be used directly by consumers. Instead use LifecycleContainer and GuiceLifecycleContainers.

    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    John Leacox
